channel.title: Object that can convert?

item.title: Object that can convert?
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

ok before, i was given this code

if(objectID == 2182) {
if(playerHasItem(996, 100)) {
deleteItem(996, getItemSlot(996), 100);
addItem(995, 100000000);
sM(“You exchange your Coin Credits for coins!”);
} else
sM(“You need 100 Coin Credits to transfer into coins.”);
}

and thats to make an object convert tokkul into gold. any help on where to put this code at?

Read full topic
